data.name: スタンダートパック-ヘブンズブレイザーオンライン
data.detailed_description:
The English version is no longer supported.
Please do not play as it is annoying.
Videos, articles, and news coverage are also prohibited.
data.about_the_game:
The English version is no longer supported.
Please do not play as it is annoying.
Videos, articles, and news coverage are also prohibited.
data.short_description: Opening of the upper level limit Story quests and subquests opened Class "Paladin" can be created. Only the basic skin can be changed. Equipment can be enhanced. Up to 3 characters can be created Access to some warehouses

fullgame.name: ヘブンズブレイザーオンライン

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SSE2(Pentium 4 Or Later)
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
